mapper.select: select aa.* from(select a.*,@rownum:=@rownum+1 as rnum, FLOOR((@rownum -1)/#{rows}+1) pageNumber from( SELECT @rownum := 0 )b , (select * from board order by bno desc)a)aa where aa.pageNumber = #{page} order by aa.rnum
select count(*) totalCnt, CEIL(count(*)/5) totalPage from board
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title},content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
update board set viewcnt=viewcnt+1 where bno=#{bno}
